text: <a href="../2-Chronicles-17-1/" title="2 Chronicles 17:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 And Jehoshaphat his son reigned in his stead, and strengthened himself against Israel.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-2/" title="2 Chronicles 17:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 And he placed forces in all the fenced cities of Judah, and set garrisons in the land of Judah, and in the cities of Ephraim, which Asa his father had taken.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-3/" title="2 Chronicles 17:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 And the LORD was with Jehoshaphat, because he walked in the first ways of his father David, and sought not unto Baalim;

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-4/" title="2 Chronicles 17:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 But sought to the *LORD* God of his father, and walked in his commandments, and not after the doings of Israel.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-5/" title="2 Chronicles 17:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 Therefore the LORD stablished the kingdom in his hand; and all Judah brought to Jehoshaphat presents; and he had riches and honour in abundance.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-6/" title="2 Chronicles 17:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 And his heart was lifted up in the ways of the LORD: moreover he took away the high places and groves out of Judah.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-7/" title="2 Chronicles 17:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 Also in the third year of his reign he sent to his princes, *even* to Benhail, and to Obadiah, and to Zechariah, and to Nethaneel, and to Michaiah, to teach in the cities of Judah.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-8/" title="2 Chronicles 17:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 And with them *he sent* Levites, *even* Shemaiah, and Nethaniah, and Zebadiah, and Asahel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehonathan, and Adonijah, and Tobijah, and Tobadonijah, Levites; and with them Elishama and Jehoram, priests.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-9/" title="2 Chronicles 17:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 And they taught in Judah, and *had* the book of the law of the LORD with them, and went about throughout all the cities of Judah, and taught the people.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-10/" title="2 Chronicles 17:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 And the fear of the LORD fell upon all the kingdoms of the lands that *were* round about Judah, so that they made no war against Jehoshaphat.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-11/" title="2 Chronicles 17:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 Also *some* of the Philistines brought Jehoshaphat presents, and tribute silver; and the Arabians brought him flocks, seven thousand and seven hundred rams, and seven thousand and seven hundred he goats.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-12/" title="2 Chronicles 17:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 And Jehoshaphat waxed great exceedingly; and he built in Judah castles, and cities of store.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-13/" title="2 Chronicles 17:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 And he had much business in the cities of Judah: and the men of war, mighty men of valour, *were* in Jerusalem.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-14/" title="2 Chronicles 17:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 And these *are* the numbers of them according to the house of their fathers: Of Judah, the captains of thousands; Adnah the chief, and with him mighty men of valour three hundred thousand.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-15/" title="2 Chronicles 17:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 And next to him *was* Jehohanan the captain, and with him two hundred and fourscore thousand.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-16/" title="2 Chronicles 17:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 And next him *was* Amasiah the son of Zichri, who willingly offered himself unto the LORD; and with him two hundred thousand mighty men of valour.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-17/" title="2 Chronicles 17:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 And of Benjamin; Eliada a mighty man of valour, and with him armed men with bow and shield two hundred thousand.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-18/" title="2 Chronicles 17:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 And next him *was* Jehozabad, and with him an hundred and fourscore thousand ready prepared for the war.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-17-19/" title="2 Chronicles 17:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 These waited on the king, beside *those* whom the king put in the fenced cities throughout all Judah.
